name: Welcome to Vivarium: Friend-Ship Simulator Voice Claims
name_original: Welcome to Vivarium: Friend-Ship Simulator Voice Claims
description:
Welcome to Vivarium: Friend-Ship Simulator is an upcoming visual novel choices game developed by myself focusing around making friends, ships and exploring the island of Vivarium while you attend Toshio University. These voice claims were made within the same engine that the game is going to be in, however do not reflect what the game will look like entirely. There is a video version that you can watch which has been linked. Support is welcome for the project!
Warning: May contain spoilers for the following games, as well as explicit language: Danganronpa 1: Trigger Happy Havoc, Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair, Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony, Persona 5, Spiderman: Into the Spiderverse
